about.title: About The Invoice
about.subtitle: A simple, fast, multilingual invoice generator for freelancers and small teams.
about.whatThisIsBody: The Invoice is a lightweight web app that helps you create professional invoices quickly. It supports real-time preview, automatic totals, multiple currencies, PDF export, and multi-language UI.
whoItsForList: Freelancers who need clean invoices fast
Small businesses sending one-off or recurring invoices
Anyone who prefers a simple tool with no signup
howItWorksSteps: Fill in your invoice details in the form
See the real-time preview update on the right
Export a high-quality PDF with one click

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
